# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/chart.js`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Chart.js (https://github.com/nnnick/Chart.js).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped.git/tree/master/types/chart.js

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Thu, 10 May 2018 20:18:20 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: Chart
